column1: #Text=Android EngineerPosition Level: Senior...Product Team/Group: Mobile CheckoutWork Location: Remote (Store Support Center).Can position remain remote after Covid Restrictions are lifted?

#Text=YesExtension of Assignment Possible: YesSpecial Work Hours Required : NoLocation: Irving, TexasJob Type: ContractWork Hours: 9 to 5TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS: NoPROJECT DESCRIPTION/JOB SUMMARYLooking for seasoned Sr.
#Text=Android engineers to be a part of an amazing transformation in how we operate our stores and become part of our Mobile Checkout Team.
#Text=You're joining a multidisciplinary team of product managers, marketers, designers and engineers who create digital products that hundreds of thousands of customers experience every day.

#Text=You will be actively participating in designing, developing, testing and deploying code to drive our digital products.KEY RESPONSIBILITIES AND DUTIESIn this role, you will design, build, and support the mobile checkout features in our Android app.
#Text=You should be able to navigate and suggest improvements on application from an architectural stand point.
#Text=At the same time, keep security in forefront of all decision making.

#Text=You will be working with a dynamic and collaborative team that integrates a wide array of technologies into a cohesive IT Solution that enables our business to provide more value to our customers & franchisees and also drive down costs.Qualifications:EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCEEDUCATION: Bachelors/4 Yr DegreeYEARS OF RELEVANT WORK EXPERIENCE: 5+ Yearsminimum years of management experience required."

#Text=Carefully review the job posting for details on vaccine/testing requirements or ask your Spherion representative for more information EDUCATION: Bachelors/4 Yr Degree YEARS OF RELEVANT WORK EXPERIENCE: 5+ Years minimum years of management experience required MUST HAVE" SPECIFIC KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS Minimum of Bachelor's degree At least 5 years of Android Development Experience Experience in designing and developing mobile applications in a complex operating and cross functional environment Proven experience/responsibility for design and architectural decisions of app in the app store Experience developing apps that interact with Web Services (REST, JSON) Demonstrated knowledge and practical application of design patterns Proficient in Kotlin, Android Jetpack components xml and software development tools - Git, Jira Strong understanding of core android fundamentals - activities, views, intents, services, fragments, Android Manifest, android lifecycle events Experience working with libraries like Retrofit, OkHttp, web services, firebase, and other common libs and concepts Knowledge of working in an Agile development environment Familiarity with SCRUM as a development method for Agile Development Must have strong teamwork orientation and the ability to foster collaboration within and across teams ADDITIONAL SKILLS AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS Experience developing location-based services with MapKit, Google Maps or similar framework Experience with multithreading, memory management, and caching mechanisms specific to mobile devices Experience owning and leading major components in partnership with Architects and Technology leaders Work Hours: 9 to 5 You will be actively participating in designing, developing, testing and deploying code to drive our digital products In this role, you will design, build, and support the mobile checkout features in our Android app At the same time, keep security in forefront of all decision making You will be working with a dynamic and collaborative team that integrates a wide array of technologies into a cohesive IT Solution that enables our business to provide more value to our customers & franchisees and also drive down costs In addition, Spherion offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, and an incentive and recognition program (all benefits are based on eligibility)
